title: view collectible

milestone.description:
General:
- Memory Usage Improvements (part 2)

Chat:
- Fixes & Improvements to ENS support
- Fixes & Improvements to chat input

Communities:
- Communities MVP admin functionality 

Wallet:
- Second bridge integragrated
- Bridge UI
- Multi Transaction view + notification
- Latency improvement for fetching data in the wallet
- keycard
  Import or restore a Keycard via a seed phrase
  Migrate an exsiting account from Keycard to Status Desktop
  UI for the keycard settings in case user has set up a keycard

body:
### Description

https://www.figma.com/file/FkFClTCYKf83RJWoifWgoX/Wallet-v2?node-id=6455%3A122769

Implements the ERC721 view as in design

Acceptance criteria:

- Header shows:
-- Collection icon
-- Collection name
-- Collectible ID
-- Network tag (Icon + name)
- Body shows:
-- Collectible name
-- Collectible description
- Property names in original case (as delivered by OpenSea)

There should be a "compact" mode when the window is narrow, and a "normal" mode when the windows is wide, altering:
- General margins
- Header items positioning+sizes
- Collecctible image size

Current:

![Screenshot_20221115_111308](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11161531/201942923-8e28525c-dc5e-4b3a-aa20-c6cbfb522d1c.png)

Model:

![Screenshot_20221115_111539](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11161531/201943004-d402014f-a221-40d7-ac78-e7601d58cf7b.png)
![Screenshot_20221115_111559](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11161531/201943019-eaafc97c-f7ca-496c-954c-4bb5dba9d83b.png)
![Screenshot_20221115_111615](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11161531/201943039-f53243d2-35ea-46b7-af0a-6781bab60b1c.png)

Visual changes:

- General
  - Header
  1. Replace Collection icon with Status icon?
  2. Replace Collectible name with Collection name
  3. Add network icon + name
  4. In Narrow mode, smaller Status icon
  - Body
  1. Add title with Collectible name
  2. Lighter Description color
  3. In Narrow mode, smaller ID, next to network icon
  4. In Narrow mode, smaller Collectible image
  5. In Narrow mode, smaller left margin
  - Properties
  1. Property names not in uppercase
  - Activity
  1. Add Activity tab

Bugs:

- Fix crash

Steps to reproduce:
1. Setup wallet with two view-only accounts with collectibles (examples: `0x5aB130251D128bc10Df5F77573A8983307822d36`, `0x648550Eaca1654A1e65B13cf385Ef9Ff505dE909`, `0xb9eB79E3E735Ee636255dD8D65872a1287744e33`)
4. Go to the `Collectibles` tab of one account, expand one of the collections, click one of the collectibles.
6. Click other accounts.
After switching accounts a couple of times, the application will crash
```
DBG 2022-11-15 11:06:54.318-03:00 NewBE_callPrivateRPC                       topics="rpc" tid=204082 file=core.nim:20 rpc_method=wallet_getOpenseaAssetsByOwnerAndCollection
qml: Fetching the-bright-benzi-bananas-ai-pass
DBG 2022-11-15 11:06:55.938-03:00 NewBE_callPrivateRPC                       topics="rpc" tid=204082 file=core.nim:20 rpc_method=wallet_getOpenseaAssetsByOwnerAndCollection
qrc:/StatusQ/src/StatusQ/Components/StatusSmartIdenticon.qml:47:17: Unable to assign [undefined] to double
qrc:/StatusQ/src/StatusQ/Components/StatusSmartIdenticon.qml:47:17: Unable to assign [undefined] to double
qrc:/StatusQ/src/StatusQ/Components/StatusSmartIdenticon.qml:47:17: Unable to assign [undefined] to double
qrc:/StatusQ/src/StatusQ/Components/StatusSmartIdenticon.qml:47:17: Unable to assign [undefined] to double
qrc:/StatusQ/src/StatusQ/Components/StatusSmartIdenticon.qml:47:17: Unable to assign [undefined] to double
qrc:/imports/shared/controls/InformationTag.qml:34:9: QML Image: Cannot open: qrc:/imports/assets/icons/tiny/.svg
DBG 2022-11-15 11:06:59.272-03:00 NewBE_callPrivateRPC                       topics="rpc" tid=204109 file=core.nim:20 rpc_method=wallet_getOpenseaCollectionsByOwner
qrc:/imports/shared/controls/InformationTag.qml:34:9: QML Image: Cannot open: qrc:/imports/assets/icons/tiny/.svg
qrc:/imports/shared/controls/InformationTag.qml:34:9: QML Image: Cannot open: qrc:/imports/assets/icons/tiny/.svg
qrc:/imports/shared/controls/InformationTag.qml:34:9: QML Image: Cannot open: qrc:/imports/assets/icons/tiny/.svg
Traceback (most recent call last)
/home/dlipicar/repos/status-desktop/src/nim_status_client.nim(181) nim_status_client
/home/dlipicar/repos/status-desktop/src/nim_status_client.nim(178) mainProc
/home/dlipicar/repos/status-desktop/vendor/nimqml/src/nimqml/private/qguiapplication.nim(29) exec
/home/dlipicar/repos/status-desktop/vendor/nimqml/src/nimqml/private/qobject.nim(49) qobjectCallback
/home/dlipicar/repos/status-desktop/vendor/nimqml/src/nimqml/private/qobject.nim(34) onSlotCalled
SIGSEGV: Illegal storage access. (Attempt to read from nil?)
make: *** [Makefile:631: run-linux] Error 1
```

Property names are currently switched to all-uppercase in status-go. If we remove that, we get the property names as delivered by OpenSea. 

Some collectibles use lowercase:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11161531/203584718-7966468e-d8ff-4d79-80d8-9cc722c0a5ff.png)

Some have the first letter of each word on upppercase
 ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11161531/203584905-88df27a0-e0d2-403f-bdfe-5ff8cacbdb80.png)

Should we leave the property names in their original form, or perform some particular case change?
